GAME.описание Иллюминатов: By joining Illuminati you can lobby a bill that will tax all other players except you for 300B each round for next 5 rounds at the round start
GAME.описание Масонов: Massons ask you for a little favor for which they will sponsor you with 500B next 6 rounds at the round start, your initial deposit is returnable
GAME.Игрока спонсируют Иллюминаты: The player is sponsored by the Massons
GAME.Игрок находится под санкциями правительс: The player immune to Illuminati lobby
